name: Wheat field
description:
Premise

You are a flower in the wheat fields who find two individuals that need your help. They are unable to move due to the fact that one of them is a flower and the other one is stuck underground. You, the only flower that can walk, is tasked with collecting resources. By helping these two individuals, you are rewarded with your very own party hat. 

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

F - Shoot petals

Enter - Continue dialogue

Things To Do

Explore the world by jumping on the clouds or swimming in the underground water. Learn the crafting table combinations. Completing the flower NPC's tasks rewards you with a lance which you can give to the slime to exchange for a party hat.
